mapper.select: SELECT cc.cateName, cc.curriculumCate_no, c.curriculum_no, c.package_no, c.curriName, c.startDate, c.endDate, c.time, c.maxCnt, c.price, c.support, c.managerInfo, c.state, c.curriNickname, c.curriculumCate_no, c.mainViewFlag, c.detailViewFlag, c.gisuName, p.packageName, p.package_no FROM Curriculum as c, Package as p, CurriculumCate as cc WHERE c.package_no = p.package_no AND cc.curriculumCate_no = c.curriculumCate_no AND c.curriculum_no = #{curriculum_no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Curriculum ( curriculumCate_no, package_no, curriName, curriNickname, startDate, endDate, time, maxCnt, price, support, managerInfo, state, gisuName) VALUES( #{curriculumCate_no}, #{package_no}, #{curriName}, #{curriNickname}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{time}, #{maxCnt}, #{price}, #{support}, #{managerInfo}, #{state}, #{gisuName} )
mapper.select: SELECT cc.cateName, c.curriculum_no, c.package_no, c.curriculumCate_no, c.curriName, c.startDate, c.endDate, c.time, c.maxCnt, c.price, c.support, c.managerInfo, c.state, c.curriNickname, c.mainViewFlag, c.detailViewFlag FROM Curriculum as c, CurriculumCate as cc WHERE c.curriculumCate_no = cc.curriculumCate_no
SELECT curriculumCate_no, cateName, parentCode FROM CurriculumCate
SELECT curriculumCate_no, cateName FROM CurriculumCate GROUP BY cateName

SELECT u.User_no, u.NameHan, u.BirthDate, CASE u.gender WHEN 1 THEN '여자' ELSE '남자' END gender, a.TestResult, a.applicant_no, c.curriculum_no, a.gisuFlag FROM ApplyInfo as a, Users as u, Curriculum as c WHERE a.User_no = u.User_no AND c.curriculum_no = a.curriculum_no AND a.curriculum_no = #{curriculum_no} AND a.gisuFlag = 0

SELECT u.User_no, u.NameHan, u.BirthDate, CASE u.gender WHEN 1 THEN '여자' ELSE '남자' END gender, a.TestResult, a.applicant_no, c.curriculum_no, a.gisuFlag FROM ApplyInfo as a, Users as u, Curriculum as c WHERE a.User_no = u.User_no AND c.curriculum_no = a.curriculum_no AND a.curriculum_no = #{curriculum_no} AND a.gisuFlag = 1

SELECT u.User_no, u.NameHan, u.BirthDate, CASE u.gender WHEN 1 THEN '여자' ELSE '남자' END gender, a.TestResult, a.applicant_no FROM ApplyInfo as a, Users as u WHERE a.User_no = u.User_no AND a.applicant_no = #{applicant_no}
